      • uploadAssetWISE5

        public static Boolean uploadAssetWISE5(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file,
                                       String path,
                                       String dirName,
                                       String pathToCheckSize,
                                       Long maxTotalAssetsSize)
        Uploads the specified file to the given path.
        Parameters:
        file - the file that is to be uploaded
        path - the path to the project folder or the student uploads base directory
        dirName - the folder name to upload to which will be assets or the directory for a workgroup for a run
        pathToCheckSize - the path to check the disk space usage for. if we are uploading to a project we will check the whole project folder size. if we are uploading to a student folder we will check that student folder
        maxTotalAssetsSize - the the max disk space usage allowable
        Returns:
        true iff saving the asset was successful

      • copyAssetForReferenceWISE5

        public static String copyAssetForReferenceWISE5(String dirName,
                                                String referencedDirName,
                                                String fileName)
        Copies a student uploaded asset to the referenced directory with a timestamp and returns a JSON string that includes the filename of that copied file.
        Parameters:
        dirName - the student workgroup folder for the run
        referencedDirName - the path to the referenced files
        fileName - the file name
        Returns:
        String filename of the new copy

      • removeAssetWISE5

        public static Boolean removeAssetWISE5(String path,
                                       String dirName,
                                       String assetFileName)
                                throws IOException
        Removes an asset from the folder
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the parent folder
        dirName - the folder name
        assetFileName - the file name
        Returns:
        true iff removal was successful
        Throws:
        IOException

      • uploadAsset

        public static String uploadAsset(Map<String,org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile> fileMap,
                                 String path,
                                 String dirName,
                                 String pathToCheckSize,
                                 Long maxTotalAssetsSize)
        Uploads the specified file to the given path.
        Parameters:
        fileMap - the files that are to be uploaded
        path - the path to the project folder or the student uploads base directory
        dirName - the folder name to upload to which will be assets or the directory for a workgroup for a run
        pathToCheckSize - the path to check the disk space usage for. if we are uploading to a project we will check the whole project folder size. if we are uploading to a student folder we will check that student folder
        maxTotalAssetsSizethe - the max disk space usage allowable
        Returns:
        the message of the status of the upload

      • copyAssetForReference

        public static String copyAssetForReference(String dirName,
                                           String referencedDirName,
                                           String fileName)
        Copies a student uploaded asset to the referenced directory with a timestamp and returns a JSON string that includes the filename of that copied file.
        Parameters:
        dirName - the student workgroup folder for the run
        referencedDirName - the path to the referenced files
        fileName - the file name
        Returns:
        String filename of the new copy

      • copy

        public static void copy(File src,
                        File dest)
                 throws FileNotFoundException,
                        IOException
        Copies the given File src to the given File dest. If they are directories, recursively copies the contents of the directories.
        Parameters:
        File - src
        File - dest
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        IOException

      • ensureAssetPath

        public static boolean ensureAssetPath(String path,
                                      String dirName)
        Checks to make sure the provided project path exists. If not returns false, if it does, then checks to see if the dirName directory exists. If it does, returns true, if not, attempts to create it. If the creation is successful, returns true, if not returns false.
        Parameters:
        String - path
        String - dirName
        Returns:
        boolean

      • getSize

        public static String getSize(String path,
                             String dirName)
        Returns the size in bytes of all of the files in the specified path/dirname
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the parent directory
        dirName - the directory name
        Returns:
        the disk space usage of the folder

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        String size of all files in assets folder in bytes
